title: China Actor Boycotted for War Shrine Photos Amid Japan Tensions
content:
1. China Actor Boycotted for War Shrine Photos Amid Japan Tensions  Bloomberg
  2. Two Japan Cabinet members visit controversial Yasukuni Shrine on war anniversary  Arirang News
  3. Japan marks 76th anniversary of WWII defeat; no Suga apology  Associated Press
  4. China censures Japan over officials' visit to Yasukuni Shrine  CGTN
  5. China opposes Japanese moves on Yasukuni Shrine issue, lodges solemn representations as Japan marks 76th anniversary of surrender in WWII  Global Times

localize.title: 日本が緊張する中、戦争神社の写真で中国の俳優がボイコットされる
在日本的紧张局势中，中国演员因战争神社的照片而受到抵制
